department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: A tender to acquire a 7.0-7.5 mts. Aluminum RHIB with trailer. Requirement is governed by the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) / WTO-AGP/ CPTPP/ CFTA / FTAs with Peru / Colombia / Panama / Korea / UK.
description: 7.0-7.5M Aluminum RHIB with trailer, for Transport Canada Transport Canada has a requirement for the fabrication and supply of one 7.0-7.5 metre, aluminum hull rigid inflatable boat with trailer, with delivery by March 22, 2024.
full_summary:
Tender Notice
----------------

### Project Title

`7.0-7.5M Aluminum RHIB with Trailer`

### Solicitation Document

Reference Number: `PW-XLV-594-8415`
Amendment Number: `2`
Solicitation Number: `T1926-220011/A`

### Brief Overview

The Government of Canada, through Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), is seeking bids for the procurement of a 7.0-7.5-meter aluminum rigid inflatable boat (RHIB) with a trailer, in accordance with the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).

### Key Details

*   The tendering procedure is competitive and selective, with the lowest price being the primary selection criterion.
*   The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization - Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).
*   The tenderer should be able to meet the qualification requirements, or be listed on the permanent list of suppliers.

### Requirements

The tenderer must be able to supply one 7.0-7.5-meter aluminum RHIB with trailer by March 22, 2024, as part of the contract. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Documents and Languages

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The contact information for this opportunity is as follows:

Tracy Birtwistle
Contracting Authority
(236) 464-0497
[tracy.birtwistle@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:tracy.birtwistle@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)\
401 - 1230 Government Street, Victoria, BC, V8W 3X4

Note: All tendering documents and specifications can be found on the [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) website.  Contact the contracting officer to discuss the contract/agreement. 

All dates and times are local times. Any questions or requests for clarification must be directed through [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities), via the Ontario region website, or as per instructions provided in Schedule B of this RFSA document. Failure to do so may result
